ns1:repetative.ns1:name: tip1
ns1:repetative.ns1:description: Hello! This is the learning tips. You can skip them, but I recommend you to read it if you are playing in the first time. There is a lot of mechanics and some of them quite complicated.

ns1:repetative.ns1:name: tip2
ns1:repetative.ns1:description: It is your people. By clicking on this icon, you can find all of their needs and consumptions. Right now, they need just some food, but after some researching, needs rise.

ns1:repetative.ns1:name: tip3
ns1:repetative.ns1:description: Number of people also displayed on this panel

ns1:repetative.ns1:name: tip4
ns1:repetative.ns1:description: Higher you can find the current date and the game speed.

ns1:repetative.ns1:name: tip5
ns1:repetative.ns1:description: This is the time managament menu. Here, you can decrease, increase the game speed or pause/unpause it.

ns1:repetative.ns1:name: tip6
ns1:repetative.ns1:description: Here is your free workers that can be assigned to any job.

ns1:repetative.ns1:name: tip7
ns1:repetative.ns1:description: Right now all the people collecting wild vegetables. Let's have a look on the structure closer

ns1:repetative.ns1:name: tip8
ns1:repetative.ns1:description: This is the number of workers assigned on this job

ns1:repetative.ns1:name: tip9
ns1:repetative.ns1:description: This is the current stock quantity and warehouse size.

ns1:repetative.ns1:name: tip10
ns1:repetative.ns1:description: This is the productivity of the current items: if it is positive, amount is rising, if it is negative, amount is decreasing. Based on the productivity, the arrow colors are changing: If source materials are rising, arrows are green. if source materials are going down, arrows are red. If source materials are constant, arrows are white. You can find this information on the color legend
